text: 12.2 Epe 1.18, 4.23, 5.10, 5.17, Kol 1.21, 1 Pi 1.14, 1 Jo 2.15 Binɨb lum awl pel gɨpal tek ma gɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi pen God yɨl mɨdem, nɨbop gos kɨdeyɨl ñaknɨŋ, binɨb gos ke kɨdeyɨl nɨb tek lɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbop gos ñɨl, ke kɨdeyɨl nɨb tek lek gem amek nɨm, God gos ne ke nɨgup ak nɨgɨnɨgabɨm. Gos ne ke nɨgup ak mɨdupsek, mɨdtep gɨnɨgab adek ak sek, nop tep gɨnɨgab adek ak sek, yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab adek ak sek, gos ne ke nɨgup ak mɨdupsek nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm.
